title: What is the state of democracy in the U.S.?
description: NPR's Scott Simon speaks to author Anne Applebaum about how the U.S. may be headed toward authoritarianism.
content: NPR's Scott Simon speaks to author Anne Applebaum about how the U.S. may be headed toward authoritarianism.
